39  class GWEN_EXPORT LabeledRadioButton : public Base
40  {
41  public:
42 
43  GWEN_CONTROL_INLINE(LabeledRadioButton, Base)
44  {
45  SetSize(200, 19);
46  m_RadioButton = new RadioButton(this);
47  m_RadioButton->Dock(Pos::Left);
48  m_RadioButton->SetMargin(Margin(0, 2, 2, 2));
49  m_RadioButton->SetTabable(false);
50  m_RadioButton->SetKeyboardInputEnabled(false);
51  m_Label = new LabelClickable(this);
52  m_Label->SetAlignment(Pos::CenterV|Pos::Left);
53  m_Label->SetText("Radio Button");
54  m_Label->Dock(Pos::Fill);
55  m_Label->onPress.Add(m_RadioButton, &CheckBox::OnPress);
56  m_Label->SetTabable(false);
57  m_Label->SetKeyboardInputEnabled(false);
58  }
59 
60  void RenderFocus(Gwen::Skin::Base* skin)
61  {
62  if (Gwen::KeyboardFocus != this)
63  return;
64 
65  if (!IsTabable())
66  return;
67 
68  skin->DrawKeyboardHighlight(this, GetRenderBounds(), 0);
69  }
70 
71  virtual RadioButton* GetRadioButton()
72  {
73  return m_RadioButton;
74  }
75 
76  virtual LabelClickable* GetLabel()
77  {
78  return m_Label;
79  }
80 
81  virtual bool OnKeySpace(bool bDown)
82  {
83  if (bDown)
84  m_RadioButton->SetChecked(!m_RadioButton->IsChecked());
85 
86  return true;
87  }
88 
89  virtual void Select()
90  {
91  m_RadioButton->SetChecked(true);
92  }
93 
94  private:
95 
96  RadioButton* m_RadioButton;
97  LabelClickable* m_Label;
98  };
